data.title: Awards & Recognition
data.meta_description: The official web site for Purdue Memorial Union at Purdue University, the bustling cornerstone of Purdueâs campus and home to Purdue Student Union Board, the Veteranâs Success Center and more.
data.text:
As you explore our magnificent building, we invite you to take note of the plaques that adorn our walls. These plaques honor the sons and daughters of Purdue who gave the ultimate sacrifice in service to our country.

Several named awards are also prominently displayed in honor of some of Purdue's most influential and inspiring leaders. Their significant contributions to Purdue and its student body paved the way for future generations of Boilermakers to take Giant Leaps.

Lisa Frank

Lisa Frank is a senior studying Law & Society with minors in Psychology and Human Resource Management. She has worked at Krach Leadership Center for nearly two years, and thoroughly enjoys getting to know visitors, building tenants, and her lively coworkers. After her upcoming graduation, she will be moving to North Indy to fulfill her accepted role as a Paralegal for a local law firm. With excitement and gratitude, she will be starting this new chapter by taking all she has learned at Purdue and exploring this new chapter of life.

Abhishek Krovvidi

Abhishek Krovvidi is a graduate student pursuing his master’s in Business Analytics and Information Management at the Daniels School of Business, Purdue University. While pursuing his education as a full-time student, he joined Purdue Food Company as a part-time student worker and later got promoted to the position of a student lead. After his graduation, Abhishek is eager to leverage his data science skills to drive meaningful business outcomes.

Gavin Corley

Gavin Corley majored in hospitality and tourism management with a minor in event planning. During his time at Purdue, he was able to join multiple extracurricular programs on top of being a part of the Launch internship program at the Union Club Hotel. After graduation, he will be moving to Austin, Texas to be an event manager at the Westin Downtown.
